mapper.select: select OR_M_ID, OR_DATE, OR_FINAL, ME_NAME, CL_AMOUNT from `order` join `cart` on OR_CT_NUM = CT_NUM join `cart_list` on CL_CT_NUM = CL_NUM join `menu` on CL_ME_CODE = ME_CODE join `member` on OR_M_ID = M_ID where OR_M_ID = #{mId}
mapper.insert: insert into `order`(OR_CT_NUM, OR_M_ID, OR_USE, OR_TOTAL, OR_FINAL) values (#{ctNum}, #{mId}, #{useCoupon}, #{totalAmount}, #{resMoney});
